001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.product;
003
004import java.util.List;
005
006import javax.annotation.Nullable;
007
008import com.commercetools.api.models.category.CategoryReference;
009import com.commercetools.api.models.common.LocalizedString;
010import com.commercetools.api.models.common.MetaAttributes;
011import com.commercetools.api.models.common.WithLocalizedSlug;
012
013/**
014 * Interface to describe commonalities between differen product representations
015 */
016public interface ProductDataLike extends WithLocalizedSlug, MetaAttributes {
017
018    LocalizedString getName();
019
020    List<CategoryReference> getCategories();
021
022    @Nullable
023    LocalizedString getDescription();
024
025    LocalizedString getSlug();
026
027    @Nullable
028    LocalizedString getMetaTitle();
029
030    @Nullable
031    LocalizedString getMetaDescription();
032
033    @Nullable
034    LocalizedString getMetaKeywords();
035
036    /**
037     * Returns the master variant. Every product as 1 to n variants, so this is always present.
038     *
039     * @see #getAllVariants()
040     * @see #getVariants()
041     * @return the main variant in the product
042     */
043    ProductVariant getMasterVariant();
044
045    /**
046     * Gets the variants which are not identical to the master variant. This list can be empty.
047     *
048     * @see #getAllVariants()
049     * @see #getMasterVariant()
050     *
051     *
052     * @return all variants except the one in {@link #getMasterVariant()}
053     */
054    List<ProductVariant> getVariants();
055
056    /**
057     * Gets all variants in the product including the master variant as first element in the list.
058     *
059     * @see #getMasterVariant()
060     * @see #getVariants()
061     * @return all variants
062     */
063    default List<ProductVariant> getAllVariants() {
064        return ProductsPackage.getAllVariants(this);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Finds a product variant by id.
069     *
070     * @param variantId the id of the variant to find
071     * @return variant or null if no variant exists with {@code id}
072     */
073    @Nullable
074    default ProductVariant getVariant(final long variantId) {
075        final ProductVariant result;
076        if (variantId == getMasterVariant().getId()) {
077            result = getMasterVariant();
078        }
079        else {
080            result = getVariants().stream().filter(v -> v.getId() == variantId).findFirst().orElse(null);
081        }
082        return result;
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Finds a product variant by id and returns the master variant if not variant with the id is present.
087     * @param variantId the id of the variant to find
088     * @return a variant
089     */
090    default ProductVariant getVariantOrMaster(final long variantId) {
091        return ProductsPackage.getVariantOrMaster(variantId, this);
092    }
093
094    SearchKeywords getSearchKeywords();
095
096    @Nullable
097    CategoryOrderHints getCategoryOrderHints();
098}
